response.overview: DGUSA with three incredible main events. See YAMATO defend his Title against Austin Aries in an emotional match of the year candidate. The Dragon Gate six man tradition continues when Ronin battle Blood Warriors in a grudge match. PAC and Akira Tozawa collide in a bout that perfectly combines high-flying, technical and hard-hitting action. Plus much more on this DVD that plays and ships anywhere in the world. 1. Danny Steel & Charade vs. The Sin City Saints 2. Jon Moxley with Trina Michaels vs. Arik Cannon 3. Six Man Elimination Match: Brodie Lee vs. Jimmy Jacobs vs. Silas Young vs. AR Fox vs. Jon Davis vs. Hollywood Stalker Ichikawa 4. Non-Title Match: Masato Yoshino vs. Sami Callihan 5. Open The Brave Gate Title Match: PAC vs. Akira Tozawa 6. Open The Freedom Gate Title Match: YAMATO vs. Austin Aries 7. The Dragon Gate Six Man Tradition Continues: CIMA, Naruki Doi & Ricochet vs. Johnny Gargano, Chuck Taylor & Rich Swann
response.title: DGUSA Mercury Rising 2011
